certainly Jefferson's neighbors talked
about it um there are you know in
letters and various things and I
referenced them in the book and other

something that was talked about during
his time now people like James Madison
would never this is the kind of stuff
would never be referenced in any kind of
letters or James Monroe people like that

in their letters uh one of Jefferson's
friends uh close friends John Hartwell
was a person who wrote about this
in a a personal diary um so people knew
this um but as I said it's not the kind
of thing that the family would write
about
